Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Public Meetings Agenda Center](https://www.pilotpointtx.gov/951/Public-Meetings-Agenda-Center)
2. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://www.pilotpointtx.gov/246/Boards-Commissions)

   Browse through a list of boards and committees to find meeting information, agendas and minutes, a list of members, and details about each committee.
3. #### [City Council](https://www.pilotpointtx.gov/430/City-Council)

   Discover the duties, responsibilities and members that make up the Pilot Point City Council.
4. #### [City Documents](https://www.pilotpointtx.gov/241/City-Documents)

   View important city documents.
5. #### [City Manager](https://www.pilotpointtx.gov/442/City-Manager)

   The City Council appoints the City Manager, who serves as chief administrative officer by executing the laws and administering the government of the city, as directed by the City Council policies.
6. #### [City Secretary](https://www.pilotpointtx.gov/268/City-Secretary)

   The City Secretary is appointed as an Officer of the City by the Mayor and City Council to assist the City Council in their legislative capacity.
7. #### [Departments](https://www.pilotpointtx.gov/149/Departments)

   Get information regarding the departments dedicated to keeping the community moving.
